column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday September 8 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Old Richmond Rd and Delong Rd:
column4: A semi tipped over and lost part of its load on Old Richmond Rd at Delong Rd.

column3: Traffic Alert for Old Richmond Rd and Delong Rd:
column4: Old Richmond Rd is shutdown in both directions between Aphids Way and Walnut Hill Rd.

column3: Traffic Alert for Old Richmond Rd and Delong Rd:
column4: Delong Rd is shutdown at Armstrong Mill Rd to prevent traffic from proceeding toward Old Richmond Rd.
